thread.title: Manchester United leads in hailing Mahendra Singh Dhoni on end of captaincy
thread.title_full: Manchester United leads in hailing Mahendra Singh Dhoni on end of captaincy

title: Manchester United leads in hailing Mahendra Singh Dhoni on end of captaincy
text:
Manchester United leads in hailing Mahendra Singh Dhoni on end of captaincy 
Mahendra Singh Dhoni 0 05-Jan-2017 07:13:20 The Chennaiyin FC co-owner opted to resign as the skipper of India's ODI and T20I national cricket teams on Wednesday... 
Indian cricket team's most successful skipper Mahendra Singh Dhoni stepped down from captaincy in the limited overs format on Wednesday. The 35-year-old Dhoni under whom India had won two World Cups and a Champions Trophy title, stunned the cricket fraternity by relinquishing the captaincy barely 11 days before the ODI series against England.'Mahi' as he is fondly known started his journey in sports through football, turning out as a goalkeeper in his school team before switching gloves to cricket as a wicket-keeper batsman. Dhoni is a self-confessed Manchester United supporter and has been to Old Trafford twice during the Indian team's tours to England and Wales. The Red Devils came out with a tribute of their own via Twitter hailing Dhoni's achievements as captain of the Men in Blue. He is also the co-owner of Indian Super League (ISL) side Chennaiyin FC and has investments across various sports ranging from field hockey to superbike racing.
